name: Chipmunk's Adventures: Logic game (Demo)
description:
A sunshiny, summer-time, and picturesque logic mind-teaser. But summer cannot last forever. Help the Chipmunk stock up on seeds and nuts for the very cold incoming winter.

Plunge into an interesting adventure passing the forest worlds through lots of levels of varying difficulty. Put to a good use the balls and bricks; plan your actions in advance. This is not easy, because monsters and traps that must be overcome to get to the nut at the other end of the level will hinder you

Features:
● Well-thought-out levels that will stick in your memory
● Beautiful pixel art. Forest, rivers, and animals
● Relaxing music and sound effects
● Plan your actions a few steps ahead
● There is no time limit. Take your time and think as much as you like
● Hints on the most disobedient levels
● Several hours of fun and interesting gameplay

Competent planning of your further moves will help you gain gaming experience for the follow-up action in more complicated puzzles and will make you think hard

Think over different puzzles, try various options for passing, and do not be afraid to experiment

3 Worlds with increasing complexity of logic puzzles, where thinking and passing through the game can take a lot of time
---------

This is a demo version of the game. The full version is available in Steam
